replies.body: Oh *snap*, looks like that anchor just **BARELY** boop-ed you. As long as hook-type skillshots collide with your hitbox, the skillshot will then *snap* to the center of your champion model. This includes things like Nautilus' anchor, Blitz's grab, as well as Thresh's hook too.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oHb6HPmR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-04T04:45:05.274+0000)
>
> Oh *snap*, looks like that anchor just **BARELY** boop-ed you. As long as hook-type skillshots collide with your hitbox, the skillshot will then *snap* to the center of your champion model. This includes things like Nautilus' anchor, Blitz's grab, as well as Thresh's hook too.

But why not hit the minion? The minion was on the right side of the hook, but the hook goes even further right to get me. Why I was connected with instead of the minion is what is bothering me.
